attributes.action: Retain & reinstate the Freedom Pass for London’s autistic population.
attributes.background:
The Freedom Pass benifit, in recent times, has already been & going to be revoked for the autistic population of my local London borough & possibly other London boroughs as well.

I am calling for the Freedom Pass to be reinstated & retained to autistic people who heavily rely of it.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because your local council is responsible for the Freedom Pass, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could contact your local councillor, who represents you. You can find their contact details here:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
